Texts.Eng:
Terrakin are a curious lot. Tied to nature, they are generally not found outside of forested regions. Outside of wooden regions they are typically quite unhappy, morose and unapproachable.
    
Diet: Herbivore 
 
^orange;Perks^reset;: 
Resist: ^green;10^reset;% Shadow, ^green;30^reset;% Poison
Attrition: +100% Max Food
+^green;7^reset;% Jump and Speed
^green;Slowly regenerate HP^reset;

^orange;Environment^reset;: 
Gain additional 25% vitality and protection in ^green;Forested and Jungle type^reset; biomes 
    
^orange;Weapons^reset;:
Bow/Crossbow: +^green;2^reset;% Crit Chance, +^green;15^reset;% Power
Spear/Shortspear: +^green;2^reset;% Crit Chance, +^green;25^reset;% Knockback Resistance
    
^red;Weaknesses^reset;: 
^red;10^reset;% Cosmic, ^red;20^reset;% Radiation
